name: Belittle
description:
Belittle is a survival horror puzzle-platform game. 

 Summary: This is the story of Alfred who woke up in a different world where he needs to face all of his fears to overcome the challenges and go back to his real world. To him it may be a dream, but the other world reflects on his struggles in the modern world as a human being. 

FEATURES:
- Story mode
- Multiplayer mode (Escape Room)
- User Friendly
- Linear Story

Recommended Specifications:
- Android Version: Android 8.1 (Oreo), EMUI 8.2
- Chipset: Kirin 710 (12 nm)
- CPU: Octa-core (4x2.2 GHz Cortex-A73 & 4x1.7 GHz Cortex-A53)
- GPU: Mali-G51 MP4
- RAM: 4gb
- Storage Capacity: 612mb
